title: Tech, an Early Booster of Remote Work, Wants People Back in the Office
description: The reversal is creating tension for workers who adjusted to the flexibility gained during the pandemic and arranged their lives accordingly.

title: U.S. Tech Giants Are Slowly Cutting Off Hong Kong Internet Users
description: Google and OpenAI haven’t rolled out AI chatbots to the city, putting it alongside mainland China and North Korea.

title: There Are Good and Bad Ways to Share Passwords
description: Don’t: Use email or SMS. Do: Use an encrypted password manager.
